remarks: Lemma for ~ lclkr .  Thus, the sum has a closed kernel when ` B ` is zero.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Jan-2015.)
statement:

lclkrlem2m.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.

lclkrlem2m.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.

lclkrlem2q.lg $e |- ( ph -> ( L ` G ) = ( ._|_ ` { Y } ) ) $.
lclkrlem2q.b $e |- B = ( X .- ( ( ( ( E .+ G ) ` X ) .X. ( I ` ( ( E .+ G ) ` Y ) ) ) .x. Y ) ) $.
lclkrlem2q.n $e |- ( ph -> ( ( E .+ G ) ` Y ) =/= .0. ) $.
lclkrlem2r.bn $e |- ( ph -> B = ( 0g ` U ) ) $.
